languages.text: They are the living embodiment of all that is wanton and cruel in the Aeldari species. Highly intelligent and devious to the point of obsession, Drukhari are forsaken and corrupt xenos that eternally thirst for the psychic energy of the anguish and torment of other thinking beings in order to save their own souls.
languages.original_text: Они — живое воплощение жестокости и распутства расы эльдар. Крайне умные и коварные до одури, друкари — извращенные и отвергнутые ксеносы, вечно жаждущие поглощать психическую энергию, выделяемую из страданий и отчаянья других разумных существ, чтобы спасти свои собственные проклятые души.

traits.locale_text: The living embodiment of all that is wanton and cruel in the Aeldari species. Highly intelligent and devious to the point of obsession, Drukhari are forsaken and corrupt xenos that eternally thirst for the psychic energy of the anguish and torment of other thinking beings in order to save their own souls.

The living embodiment of all that is wanton and cruel in the Aeldari species. Highly intelligent and devious to the point of obsession, Drukhari are forsaken and corrupt xenos that eternally thirst for the psychic energy of the anguish and torment of other thinking beings in order to save their own souls.

They are the living embodiment of all that is wanton and cruel in the Aeldari species. Highly intelligent and devious to the point of obsession, Drukhari are forsaken and corrupt xenos that eternally thirst for the psychic energy of the anguish and torment of other thinking beings in order to save their own souls.

languages.text: Они — живое воплощение жестокости и распутства расы эльдар. Крайне умные и коварные до одури, друкари — извращенные и отвергнутые ксеносы, вечно жаждущие поглощать психическую энергию, выделяемую из страданий и отчаянья других разумных существ, чтобы спасти свои собственные проклятые души.

Sie sind die lebende Verkörperung all dessen, was an der Spezies der Aeldari mutwillig und grausam ist. Hochintelligent und verschlagen bis zur Besessenheit, sind Drukhari verlorene und gewissenlose Xenos, die ewig nach der psionischen Energie der Qualen und Folterung anderer denkender Wesen dürsten, um ihre eigenen Seelen zu retten.
languages.original_text: They are the living embodiment of all that is wanton and cruel in the Aeldari species. Highly intelligent and devious to the point of obsession, Drukhari are forsaken and corrupt xenos that eternally thirst for the psychic energy of the anguish and torment of other thinking beings in order to save their own souls.

traits.locale_text: Sie sind die lebende Verkörperung all dessen, was an der Spezies der Aeldari mutwillig und grausam ist. Hochintelligent und verschlagen bis zur Besessenheit, sind Drukhari verlorene und gewissenlose Xenos, die ewig nach der psionischen Energie der Qualen und Folterung anderer denkender Wesen dürsten, um ihre eigenen Seelen zu retten.

languages.text: Incarnations vivantes du vice et de la cruauté des Aeldaris. Très intelligents et perfides jusqu'à l'obsession, les Drukharis sont des xénos dévoyés qui ont éternellement soif de l'énergie psychique des autres êtres pensants qu'ils tourmentent et terrorisent afin de sauver leurs propres âmes.
languages.original_text: They are the living embodiment of all that is wanton and cruel in the Aeldari species. Highly intelligent and devious to the point of obsession, Drukhari are forsaken and corrupt xenos that eternally thirst for the psychic energy of the anguish and torment of other thinking beings in order to save their own souls.

traits.locale_text: Incarnations vivantes du vice et de la cruauté de l'espèce Aeldari. Très intelligents et perfides jusqu'à l'obsession, les Drukhari sont des xénos dévoyés qui ont éternellement soif de l'énergie psychique des autres êtres pensants qu'ils tourmentent et terrorisent afin de sauver leurs propres âmes.

languages.text: 黑暗灵族是遭到遗弃的堕落灵族，是艾达灵族残暴、恶毒与放纵的化身。他们非常聪明，对痛苦的渴望几乎到达了痴迷的地步。他们渴求折磨一切有思想的生物，从他们的痛苦之中获得灵能能量，用来维持他们的灵魂。
languages.original_text: They are the living embodiment of all that is wanton and cruel in the Aeldari species. Highly intelligent and devious to the point of obsession, Drukhari are forsaken and corrupt xenos that eternally thirst for the psychic energy of the anguish and torment of other thinking beings in order to save their own souls.

traits.locale_text: 黑暗灵族是遭到遗弃的堕落灵族，是艾达灵族残暴、恶毒与放纵的化身。他们非常聪明，对痛苦的渴望几乎到达了痴迷的地步。他们渴求折磨一切有思想的生物，从他们的痛苦之中获得灵能能量，用来维持他们的灵魂。

languages.text: 彼らはアエルダリという種族が持つ貪欲で残酷なものすべてを体現している。高い知能を持ち、執着心が強く狡猾なデュカーリは、堕落した孤独な異種族であり、自らの魂を救うため、他の知的生命体の苦悩と苦痛の精神エネルギーを永遠に渇望する。
languages.original_text: They are the living embodiment of all that is wanton and cruel in the Aeldari species. Highly intelligent and devious to the point of obsession, Drukhari are forsaken and corrupt xenos that eternally thirst for the psychic energy of the anguish and torment of other thinking beings in order to save their own souls.

traits.locale_text: 彼らはアエルダリという種族が持つ貪欲で残酷なものすべてを体現している。高い知能を持ち、執着心が強く狡猾なデュカーリは、堕落した孤独な異種族であり、自らの魂を救うため、他の知的生命体の苦悩と苦痛の精神エネルギーを永遠に渇望する。

languages.text: Vivo ejemplo del libertinaje y la crueldad de la especie Aeldari. Los Drukhari, con su gran inteligencia y retorcidos hasta rozar la obsesión, son xenos desamparados y corruptos que codician la energía psíquica de la angustia y el tormento de otros seres pensantes para salvar sus propias almas.
languages.original_text: They are the living embodiment of all that is wanton and cruel in the Aeldari species. Highly intelligent and devious to the point of obsession, Drukhari are forsaken and corrupt xenos that eternally thirst for the psychic energy of the anguish and torment of other thinking beings in order to save their own souls.

traits.locale_text: Vivo ejemplo del libertinaje y la crueldad de la especie Aeldari. Los Drukhari, con su gran inteligencia y retorcidos hasta rozar la obsesión, son xenos desamparados y corruptos que codician la energía psíquica de la angustia y el tormento de otros seres pensantes para salvar sus propias almas.
